name: Danmakai: Red Forbidden Fruit
storyline:
The MAKAI is in crisis...
Eldied and Diana, two demon girls, leave on a quest to defeat the main evil.

Get past the Danmaku and try to clear it!

Aggressive play is the closest you'll get to capturing it, and this is a Danmaku shooter with a Rank System.
Defeating enemy, Graze a bullet, Shooting enemy...
All of these active actions lead to Power Up.

You can use the power you've saved to maintain a strong shot and attack it,
You can also use a buster attack to eliminate enemy bullets while blowing them away,
Your play style depends on your ability.

The beauty of the Danmaku and the pleasure of the Shooter is Here!
summary: PowerUp and BusterAttack! Despite the beauty of the Danmaku aggressive playing leads to victory in this Makaism Danmaku shooter. The Danmaku Garden awaits you. There's even a cat!
